headline.main: Russia Denies Its Aircraft Violated Bulgarian Airspace
headline.print_headline: Russia Denies Its Aircraft Violated Bulgarian Airspace

docs.snippet: Russia on Monday rejected allegations by Bulgaria that its aircraft had been involved in violations of Bulgarian airspace, Russian news agencies reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia on Monday rejected allegations by Bulgaria that its aircraft had been involved in violations of Bulgarian airspace, Russian news agencies reported.

headline.main: Slovenian Gorenje Says Panasonic May Bid to Take It Over
headline.print_headline: Slovenian Gorenje Says Panasonic May Bid to Take It Over

docs.snippet: Slovenian home appliances maker Gorenje said on Monday it had signed a deal with Japanese consumer electronics firm Panasonic Corporation that could lead to Panasonic taking it over....
docs.lead_paragraph: Slovenian home appliances maker Gorenje said on Monday it had signed a deal with Japanese consumer electronics firm Panasonic Corporation that could lead to Panasonic taking it over.

headline.main: Austrian Bank Raiffeisen Plans to Sell Stake in Insurer Uniqa
headline.print_headline: Austrian Bank Raiffeisen Plans to Sell Stake in Insurer Uniqa

docs.snippet: Austria's Raiffeisen Zentralbank [RZB.UL] plans to sell most of its shares in insurer Uniqa, it said on Monday, moving towards bolstering its capital reserves while it considers merging with a listed unit for the same reason....
docs.lead_paragraph: Austria's Raiffeisen Zentralbank [RZB.UL] plans to sell most of its shares in insurer Uniqa, it said on Monday, moving towards bolstering its capital reserves while it considers merging with a listed unit for the same reason.

headline.main: Police Commissioner Bratton Won’t Stay on the Job Past 2017
headline.print_headline: Commissioner Won’t Stay on Job  Past ’17, Rattling Mayor’s Race

docs.snippet: William J. Bratton said in an interview that he would not be a part of a second term if Mayor de Blasio is re-elected....
docs.abstract: New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton tells New York Times in interview that he will not remain in post past 2017, throwing curve ball into Mayor Bill de Blasio's re-election campaign.

byline.original: By J. DAVID GOODMAN and AL BAKER

docs.lead_paragraph: William J. Bratton said in an interview that he would not be a part of a second term if Mayor de Blasio is re-elected.

headline.print_headline: Starbucks Shuffles Management as It Rolls Out New Store Concepts
